vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) or, rather
1a) implying that the latter choice is preferred
1b) or if, introducing an example to be seen under a particular principle
1c) (in series) either...or, whether...or
1d) if perchance
1e) except, or else
2) whether, not the least, if, otherwise, also, and, then
§ 1) or, rather
1a) implying that the latter choice is preferred
1b) or if, introducing an example to be seen under a particular principle

1d) if perchance
1e) except, or else
2) whether, not the least, if, otherwise, also, and, then
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 或者
1a) 隱含有"寧取"的意思
1b) 在一通則下, 引介一個特例
1c) 如果, 容或
1d) 除非, 不然
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 或者
1a) 隐含有"宁取"的意思
1b) 在一通则下, 引介一个特例
1c) 如果, 容或
1d) 除非, 不然
